Plot: A delusional young man strikes up an unconventional relationship with a doll he finds on the Internet.
Title: Lars and the Real Girl
Actors: Ryan Gosling, Emily Mortimer, Paul Schneider, R.D. Reid
tomatoConsensus: Lars and the Real Girl could've so easily been a one-joke movie. But the talented cast, a great script, and direction never condescends to its character or the audience.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 7 wins & 32 nominations.
